name: Reckless Automation
description:
Reckless Automation is a 2D platformer where you have no control over the moves of your character, instead they will be played automatically. Look at the commands at the bottom of the screen to see which commands will be executed next, and plan your movement accordingly. I might have made the game too difficult...

Controls:

  • Left Key: Move Left
  • Right Key: Move Right

If you're playing on a phone, you can tap the screen instead. Tap the left part to move left, tap the right part to move right.
